      • getSensingDevices

        java.util.List<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getSensingDevices()
        gets a list with all sensing devices in the cluster
        Returns:
        a list with all sensing devices in the cluster

      • getDevices

        java.util.List<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getDevices()
        gets a list with all "high-end" devices in the cluster. "High-end" devices are devices that can do storage, general purpose computing and others.
        Returns:
        a list with all "high-end" devices in the cluster

      • getSensors

        java.util.List<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getSensors(java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> device)
        gets all sensors configured at a specific device
        Parameters:
        device - - The device to get the sensors
        Returns:
        a list with all sensors of a specific device

      • getsensingdata

        java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,JCL_Sensor> getsensingdata(java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> device,
                                                           java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> Sensor)
        retrieves the last 10 collected data of a sensor
        Parameters:
        device - - The device which the sensor is configured
        Sensor - - The sensor to collect the sensing data
        Returns:
        a Map with the last 10 collected data of the sensor

        Parameters:
        device - - The device which the sensor is configured
        Sensor - - The sensor to collect the sensing data
        Returns:
        a Map with all the sensing data of the sensor

      • getsensingdatanow

        JCL_Sensor getsensingdatanow(java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> device,
                             java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> Sensor,
                             java.lang.Object... args)
        allows active sensing, collecting the sensing data at the given moment
        Parameters:
        device - - The device where the active sensing will occurr
        Sensor - - The sensor where the data will be retrieved
        Returns:
        a JCL_Sensor with the collected data

        retrieves all information about the device configuration
        Parameters:
        device - - The device to collect the metadata
        Returns:
        a Map with all the metadata of the device

      • setMetadata

        boolean setMetadata(java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> device,
                    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> Metadata)
        configures a device according to the metadata
        Parameters:
        device - - The device to set the metadata
        Metadata - - The metadata to configure the device
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if the metadata was configured at the device

      • restart

        boolean restart(java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> device)
        restarts JCL Host on the device
        Parameters:
        device - - The device to restart
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether the restart was performed

      • standBy

        boolean standBy(java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> device)
        puts the device in an standby mode, stopping passive sensing. It remains on this state until #turnOn(Entry) is called
        Parameters:
        device - - The device to put on standby mode
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether the device was put on standby mode

      • turnOn

        boolean turnOn(java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> device)
        turn the device on, enabling passive sensing
        Parameters:
        device - - The device to turn on
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether the device was turned on

      • setSensor

        boolean setSensor(java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> device,
                  java.lang.String sensor_alias,
                  int sensor_id,
                  int sensor_size,
                  int sensor_sampling)
        allows the configuration of a input sensor on the device
        Parameters:
        device - - The device where the sensor will be configured
        sensor_alias - - An alias for the sensor
        sensor_id - - The pin where the sensor will be configured
        sensor_size - - Indicates the maximum size in MB which will be used to store the collected sensor data
        sensor_sampling - - Indicates the interval to collect sensor data performed by the passive sensing
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether the sensor was configured

      • setSensor

        boolean setSensor(java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> device,
                  java.lang.String sensor_alias,
                  int sensor_id,
                  int sensor_size,
                  int sensor_sampling,
                  java.lang.String inputOrOutput)
        allows the configuration of a sensor on the device
        Parameters:
        device - - The device where the sensor will be configured
        sensor_alias - - An alias for the sensor
        sensor_id - - The pin where the sensor will be configured
        sensor_size - - Indicates the maximum size in MB which will be used to store the collected sensor data
        sensor_sampling - - Indicates the interval to collect sensor data performed by the passive sensing
        inputOrOutput - - An String indicating the direction of the sensor ("input" or "output")
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether the sensor was configured

      • LoadConfig

        boolean LoadConfig(java.io.File configTxt)
        configure a device according to an configuration file
        Parameters:
        configTxt - - A file with the configuration
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if the configuration was loaded
